metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8991 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: pip 1.3 through 1.5.6 allows local users to cause a denial of service (prevention of package installation) by creating a /tmp/pip-build-* file for another user.

notes.Note: msalvatore> The patch from upstream does not resolve the CVE. Backporting this the actual fix for trusty requires invasive changes that will change the command line interface. The issues is first fixed in version 7.0.0 and the changelog mentions it is backwards incompatible.

criterions.comment: python-pip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
